website_summaries.verdict: This set includes coordinated pocket squares, cufflinks, tie clips, and 3 ties and is in a neatly organized box, making it a stellar gift idea.
pros: Included ties are a quality length, especially for those looking to tie more fancy or intricate knots
Set includes instructions of how to tie knots and how to fold a pocket square, which is convenient
Quality is stellar and colors are vibrant

customer_reviews.title: exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: these look better in person. comes in a great little gift box, and seemed more expensive than it was. great gift for the man in your life, or even the roommate who needs to find a new job quickly so they can pay the rent. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mallory And Chaos

customer_reviews.title: It's a mistake I will never do again!
customer_reviews.text: Hated it... I would have returned the product if I hadn't damaged the box already. Cufflinks are cheaply made and pretty much the only thing I kept were the ties and pocket square. Would not recommend it to anyone I know. You're better of buying what you see in the product separately and in better quality then doing a gift box like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality item!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a history professor and wears ties every day of his life, so needless to say, he has about 1,000 of them. I bought this as a Valentines surprise and he loved the coordination and quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gavorsky

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. The packaging, the quality of everything is just too good. I bought this for my boss but If I was a man I’d keep them for myself 😀 don’t judge me. This gift is too good. Everyone in my office has fallen in love with it. TAVATO, you have new clients from Rwanda very soon. In fact I should be made a TAVATO ambassador in Rwanda 😂😂 because everyone who sees this gift says they are getting some for themselves or for their boyfriends, husbands etc. anyway the point is, this thing is goooooood
customer_reviews.author: angel p.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend who recently took a job where he had to dress more business than casual. He tells me he get so many compliments when he wears them. They really hit the spot
customer_reviews.author: Crystal W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, pleasant colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent tie set. I bought it as a gift for my brother who just got his first serious job offer. Great quality, pleasant colors. My Brother seemed to like it and he can use the original box to store the ties.
customer_reviews.author: Maryna

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Premium Quality!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very beautiful set of three ties with matching cufflinks and gorgeous tie clips along with extra silver set of cufflinks and tie clips! Product is exact as advertised, great quality, trendy pattern, optimal length, overall it's a great value for money! I purchased as a mens gift for my buddy's birthday and he loves it! His job requires to wear suits and ties for work everyday. With this set he will look even more professional and elegant. Box looks very fancy and expensive - ideal for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Yauheni

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric
customer_reviews.text: Fabric has a nice feel and all three ties are sewn well. Pocket squares need to be an inch bigger for proper placement.
customer_reviews.author: centralohiogal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The quality is amazing. The seller takes extra-care for the corners of the box. I will buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: Choclkey

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Came in a box to store everything in. Picture on the web only slightly brighter than the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Anne Adler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift for a high school graduate
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gift for a high school graduate. Gets him on his way to college with a very nice array of essential dress ties and matching ensemble. Perfect for upcoming dress up occaisions, job interviews, or office attire.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Love the box and all the stuff in it! If you looking for a gift, look no further.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good and high quality, I got as gift to my BFF and he loved so much. It worth every dollar.

customer_reviews.title: he really liked them, everything from the vibrant colors of the ...
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my brother in law who wears suits and ties for work everyday, he really liked them, everything from the vibrant colors of the times and how it well match everything else, to the fancy box it came in, made this gift one of his favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Father's Day
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a present for my dad for the Father's Day and I am very happy with this purchase! Ties and accessories look really stylish and polished and the overall quality is great. I can't wait to see my father wearing one of these ties!!
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Box was torn up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my boyfriend for Christmas. I came home and opened it and my first impression of the box was a beaten and torn up box. The shipping box was completely fine but the box with the actual contents in it was beaten and scrapped. I believe the accessories are fine and good quality, but I was not impressed by the box.
customer_reviews.author: camie johnson

customer_reviews.title: Extra set has little diamond accents!!
customer_reviews.text: Great look and quality for the price! Makes the perfect gift! Extra silver tie clip and cuff links set in the closed box at the right adds a nice touch with diamond accents on them! Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DEC

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best gift you can give to your man. It comes in a very cute and classy package
customer_reviews.author: Lilian barasa

customer_reviews.title: For the man that has everything
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my sweetie. He simply love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The ties are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I loved the packaging and the quality was good as far as the ties. The quality of the cuff links were not great but everything else was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a 2 thumbs up gift set!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the material used for this product and the vibrant colors...I also loved that it came in a gift set with cufflings and tie holders included! I'm very happy with this purchase I made! I actually bought it as a Christmas gift😊
customer_reviews.author: Maritza F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations beautiful men's gift box and ties we're great...

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful! Definitely worth every penny. My husband is an entrepreneur, and CEO of his own company, so he will definitely put this to good use. He loved it, can't wait to see him in these!!

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Feels premium and high-end
customer_reviews.text: I loved these ties! They look great with all of my shirts and suits, the material feels really premium. And I love those tie clips that I can now use interchangeably. I don’t really use the curflinks but maybe one day :) still, kind of a nice to have item. Overall: 5/5!

customer_reviews.title: A very nice gift set for men
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice gift set for men. Reasonable price and good material.

customer_reviews.title: Very good present for respectable gentlemen!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for present for my friend. They have dress code at work and I think this would be a good present for him. He is very satisfied with this present! Going to buy 2 more.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I find this tie set very stylish. It suits well for both formal and informal events. Colors are very calm and universal, 100% quality fabric. Have no concerns.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product. Looks really cheap
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the product. It looks cheap. I lost 64 dollars. I bought this for an emergency gift, I did not want to go through the stores and it was the worst decision I made. The delivery was late. The box was in terrible condition plus the stickers that makes it look like a cheap product made in China. I recommend you go to the store. Do not buy this product even if it have very good reviews and stars.

product_meta.title: Premium Men’s Gift Tie Set Silky Necktie Pocket Squares Tie Clips Cufflinks For Men
product_meta.description:
A Superior Quality Gift Set For Men!

Looking for the best quality necktie set to perfect your formal style?

Have you had enough with poorly crafted sets with flimsy stitching & dull colors?

Are you on the lookout for a deluxe feeling gift box for men to treat your father, boyfriend, husband or co-worker like royalty?

We Are Making Men’s Accessories Into A Quality Gift Set That For Impeccable Sleek Looks!

Made of premium polyester, with a genuine silky look and feel, our tasteful, CLASSIC STYLE tie set is offered in the optimal length of 60”, to give stylish men of all ages the formal, BUSINESS-LIKE LOOK that make them look stunning in the office, the state institute, but also on their wedding day or at the job interview.

We Are Offering You More Than Other Suppliers!

Give a classy touch to all your tuxedo events with an ALL-INCLUSIVE SET, as the 3 men’s neckties + 3 pocket squares pack is complemented with the SHINY CUFFLINKS & the 4 luxurious TIE CLIPS that accompany your set, offering you much more than any similar product on the market!

The UNIQUE Deluxe Packaging!

Our set is carefully wrapped in a DESIGNER GIFT BOX made with RECYCLED PAPER, to make a premium green product. The 3 mm walls will help you store your accessories in neat organization.

Follow the USER GUIDE included to maintain your gift set fresh like brand new for long years to come!

Buy With Confidence!

Committed to our customers’ satisfaction, we are backing our set with TAVATO Full Refund Policy, making your experience absolutely RISK-FREE!

So, Wait No More!

Click To Add To Cart NOW!






PRODUCT DETAILS

feature_bullets: GET THE PERFECT POLISHED LOOKS WITH A COMPLETE NECKTIE SET! The silky-feeling IMPORTED set of 3 60” NECKTIES width 3.15” + 3 8.86”X8.86” POCKET HANDKERCHIEFS+ 4 TIE CLIPS+ 4 CUFFLINKS will underline your chic looks on your birthday, wedding, graduation, the corporal event, the interview, the meeting and all formal events, making heads turn!

THE TOP QUALITY YOU DESERVE! If you are tired of poorly crafted necktie sets that deprive your special moments of the elegance they deserve, read on! TAVATO men’s tie pack is made of quality POLYESTER, to ensure perfect fit, sturdy manufacture, vibrant colors and peerless quality that you experience with all your senses! Durable, with SOLID STITCHING and in NON-FADING colors, it is a tie & pocket square set with guaranteed longevity.

A GREAT VALUE COMPLETE SET: Get the stylish, sleek looks on all occasions, saving money on buying separately the different accessories! We have added TREMENDOUS VALUE to your order, offering you much more than similar product sets. We are offering you as a UNIQUE FREE BONUS the luxurious TIE CLIPS & the MEN’S CUFFLINKS, to help you create your own collection for each special event!

THE BEST GIFT FOR HIM: QUALITY MADE, STYLISH, AFFORDABLE and offered in a LUXURIOUS GIFT BOX, our necktie set makes the perfect gift to thrill the bridegroom, the college graduate, the businessman or the friend on his birthday or graduation!

SHOW OFF YOUR TASTE offering TAVATO tie set to your boyfriend, husband, father, best friend or co-worker; it makes the #1 Valentine’s Day, Father’s Day, Anniversary, Retirement, Graduation or Christmas Day gift! LUXURY business gift for men.
